entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 12:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
